com.io7m.r1.kernel.types

Class KUnitQuad

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.r1.kernel.types.KUnitQuad
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.JCGLResourceSizedType, com.io7m.jcanephora.JCGLResourceUsableType, KUnitQuadUsableType

    @EqualityReference
public final class KUnitQuad
extends Object
implements KUnitQuadUsableType
    A unit quad, from (-1, -1, -1) to (1, 1, -1), oriented towards +Z.
